page.title: 12MICKLEY YOUTH CLUB
page.content:
My Dad is one of the leaders of Mickley Youth Club. It is held at St. George's Parish Hall every Wednesday night. Boys and girls from 11 years upwards can join. The other leader is a woman called Vivien. At the club snooker, table tennis, darts, cards and dominoes can be played. You can buy sweets and pop and sometimes hot dogs and coffee. Sometimes they go to the seaside or the ice rink. Sometimes they have inside bowls and screen printing. The leaders also take members on visits to other youth clubs. Team competitions are held in the club regularly. The youth club is very popular in our village.
{David Greenwood Age 9}
